title: FlipFlop Filibuster, REVENGE Procrastination? 3.25.21
itunes:title: FlipFlop Filibuster, REVENGE Procrastination? 3.25.21
description:
In episode 844, Jack and Miles are joined by Bald Talk's Charlie Sander to discuss Biden flip-flopping on filibusters, the White House sidelining staffers who have tried pot, Disney testing facial recognition technology, Republican men refusing to be vaccinated, a top Saudi official issuing a death threat against UN investigator, why we stay up late on our phones, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Report: Biden Wants Dems To Find GOP Support For Sweeping Voting Rights Bill Instead Of Gutting Filibuster
  2. Democrats plan to squeeze GOP over filibuster
  3. The Senate Means Minority Rule Even Without the Filibuster
  4. In wake of shootings, Senate renews efforts to overhaul U.S. gun laws
  5. Biden White House Sandbags Staffers, Sidelines Dozens for Pot Use
  6. Walt Disney World to Test Facial Recognition Technology at Magic Kingdom Entrances Through April
  7. Disney Data-Mining Theme Park Guests “Now More Than Ever” According to LA Times Article
  8. Why face-recognition technology has a bias problem
  9. The Major Concerns Around Facial Recognition Technology
  10. Disney Link To the F.B.I. And Hoover Is Disclosed
  11. Why Covid may mean more facial recognition tech
  12. Schools Adopt Face Recognition in the Name of Fighting Covid
  13. 49% of Republican men say they won’t get vaccinated. These wives and daughters are on a mission to change their minds.
  14. Top Saudi official issued death threat against UN's Khashoggi investigator
  15. Why You Stay Up So Late, Even When You Know You Shouldn’t 
  16. LISTEN: Notorious B.I.G. - Unbelievable (Nick Bike's 'Express Yourself' Mix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
